attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HOW MANY MORE GREEN SPACES CAN WE AFFORD TO LOSE??
People of Britain - there is a small neighbourhood in Sanders Lane, Mill Hill East, London NW7 that has access to a beautiful living, breathing, historic lane (shown on maps as far back as 1754). Barnet council want to turn leafy Sanders Lane into a busy highway, replacing it with concrete, cars and pollution. Decisions by developers, councils and government are having an adverse effect on the health of residents. It is happening throughout Britain.
The Save Sanders Lane group NEED YOUR HELP....at the hearing on Mon.13th Oct. from 13.00-16.30 and on Thursday 16th Oct. at 10.00 am, 11.15am 12.30am  14.00 and 15.15 Barnet House, 1255 The High Road, N20 OES as the Consultation process is falling on deaf hears - please support our cause- PLEASE SIGN
